it.polimi.se2018.model.schema

Class Schema

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.model.schema.Schema

  • public class Schema
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains the actual schema of a player and the relative associated schemaCardFace
    Since:
    09/05/2018
    Author:
    Nicola Fossati

    • Constructor Detail

      • Schema

        public Schema(SchemaCardFace schemaCardFace)
        Creates a new empty schema, associated with a schema
        Parameters:
        schemaCardFace - the schemaCard selected by the user to build this schema
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if schemaCardFace is null

    • Method Detail

      • getDiceFace

        public DiceFace getDiceFace(java.awt.Point point)
        Get a dice face placed in a specified point, or null if no dice was placed here
        Parameters:
        point - the position of the schema to check, 0 based
        Returns:
        the diceFace placed in the given point or null

      • setDiceFace

        public void setDiceFace(java.awt.Point point,
                        DiceFace diceFace)
        Set a diceFace in a specific point. The Schema must be empty in the point.
        Parameters:
        point - where to place a diceFace, 0 based
        diceFace - the diceFace to place
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if point not valid, or point null
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the cell is already occupied

      • removeDiceFace

        public DiceFace removeDiceFace(java.awt.Point point)
        Remove and returns a DiceFace in the Schema
        Parameters:
        point - where to remove the DiceFace
        Returns:
        the removed DiceFace

      • isDiceAllowed

        public boolean isDiceAllowed(java.awt.Point point,
                             DiceFace diceFace,
                             SchemaCardFace.Ignore ignore)
        Check if a given diceFace can be placed here, checking both the Schema and the SchemaCardFace
        Parameters:
        point - the position where the dice should be placed, 0 based
        diceFace - the diceFace to place
        ignore - the type of restricton to ignore
        Returns:
        true if the diceFace can be placed, false otherwise

      • hasOneNeighbour

        private boolean hasOneNeighbour(java.awt.Point point)
        Checks if the selected cell has at least one neighbour
        Parameters:
        point - the position to check
        Returns:
        true if has at least one neighbour, false otherwise

      • hasOneSimilarNeighbour

        private boolean hasOneSimilarNeighbour(java.awt.Point point,
                                       DiceFace diceFace)
        Checks if there is any neighbour (orthogonal) that is similar to a given DiceFace (same color || same number)
        Parameters:
        point - the position to check
        diceFace - the dice to check
        Returns:
        true if it has a similar neighbour, false otherwise.

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Check if the schema is empty
        Returns:
        true if the schema is empty, false otherwise
